title: Tech Up Amid AI Optimism -- Tech Roundup
description:
Shares of technology companies rose amid renewed optimism about the artificial intelligence boom.
Microsoft ticked down ahead of the software giant's earnings report and fell sharply in late...
content:
Shares of technology companies rose amid renewed optimism about the artificial intelligence boom.
Microsoft ticked down ahead of the software giant's earnings report and fell sharply in late trading as AI gains were not as significant as anticipated.... [1003 chars]

title: U.S. Chipmaker Nvidia's Controversial AI Assistance to China
description: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia is under scrutiny for aiding China's DeepSeek in developing AI models used by the Chinese military. Concerns arise as Nvidia's technical support helped improve DeepSeek's efficiency despite U.S. restrictions on chip sales to China, potentially eroding U.S. competitive advantage in artificial intelligence.
content: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia is facing criticism for its role in aiding China's DeepSeek, a firm that later used its artificial intelligence models for military purposes. This development was highlighted by the chairman of a U.S. House committee, who expres... [748 chars]

title: AI-altered pic of Alex Pretti is being widely circulated after his killing by Border Patrol
description: A picture of Alex Pretti that was altered by artificial intelligence to clean up his appearance — and later used by several news outlets — was originally a modest staff portrait displayed at the Veterans Affairs hospital the slain nurse worked at.
content:
A picture of Alex Pretti that was apparently AI-altered to make him look more clean cut has been widely circulating among protesters, and even some news outlets in the wake of his killing by Border Patrol agents.
Pretti, a 37-year-old armed ICU nurse... [2447 chars]

title: ‘Practice, clarity of concepts key’
description: Jaipur: Anushka Goyal, a Class 10 student of Maharaja Sawai Mansingh Vidyalaya, transformed her performance in Artificial Intelligence for CBSE board .
content: Jaipur: Anushka Goyal, a Class 10 student of Maharaja Sawai Mansingh Vidyalaya, transformed her performance in Artificial Intelligence for CBSE board exam, moving from being afraid of technology to scoring full marks in her pre-board exams. Goyal cre... [1172 chars]

title: ‘Focus on MCQs for AI in board exam’
description: Jaipur: For a fairly new subject of Artificial Intelligence (AI) for Class 10 board exam in CBSE, teachers advised students to focus their practice on.
content: Jaipur: For a fairly new subject of Artificial Intelligence (AI) for Class 10 board exam in CBSE, teachers advised students to focus their practice on multiple-choice questions, which comprise almost half the exam paper. Sarita Aswani, a teacher for ... [1216 chars]

title: Samsung sees strong AI demand after profit triples to record high
description: SEOUL, ‌Jan 29 (Reuters) - Samsung Electronics said its operating profit more than tripled to a record high in ‌the fourth quarter and forecast strong chip demand ahead, as the race to build artificial intelligence ‌strains chip supply and boosts prices.

title: CMU to launch AI platform designed to assist students in introductory courses
description: Some area college students can boost their studies with a Carnegie Mellon University initiative that uses artificial intelligence to improve learning in introductory courses. title: Institute of Cost Accountants of India, Nagpur Chapter to hold annual seminar on Jan 31
description: the nagpur chapter of the institute of cost accountants of india (icmai) will be organising its annual seminar on the contemporary and forward-looking theme ‘ai as catalyst for the gen next cma’ on january 31 at hotel centre point from 9:30 am to 5:30 pm. the seminar aims to highlight the transformative role of artificial intelligence (ai) in the evolving landscape of the cost and management accountancy profession, especially in strategic finance, business analytics, forecasting, and digital capability buil

title: ServiceNow projects annual subscription revenue above estimates, signals AI strength
description: Jan 28 (Reuters) - ServiceNow forecast annual subscription revenue above Wall Street estimates on ‌Wednesday, signaling strong demand for its artificial intelligence-powered software products.
